name: DivEarth - It's Hot Down Here
description:
Controls :

- Move on the sides with the arrows

- Shoot in directions with ZQSD/WASD

This is a work in progress.

Dive into the depths of the Earth in this vertical runner, shoot enemies to score and prove your worth.

Team : 

Lokaï : Music

YohannT : Development

Eifar : Art

Yann : Art

DaDyDoux : Game Design / Development

Special thanks to Nashoute for the extra help!
